critique: The document is an executive order issued by President Obama declaring a national emergency with respect to Somalia due to the deterioration of the security situation, violence, piracy, and violations of the arms embargo. It orders the blocking of property and interests in property of persons threatening the peace, security, or stability of Somalia. The order invokes the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA), the National Emergencies Act (NEA), section 5 of the United Nations Participation Act, and section 301 of title 3, United States Code.
